content.query:
-- Create View Calendar
CREATE VIEW gold.calendar
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://deprojectdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Calendar/',
    FORMAT='PARQUET'
) AS quer1;

-- Create View Customers
CREATE VIEW gold.customers
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://deprojectdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Customers/',
    FORMAT='PARQUET'
) AS quer1;
